title: Drugs and side effects
creator_contributor_role: Dept of Health, Richmond Implementation Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs, Nonprescription
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drugs - Side effects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mentally handicapped
description: Designed to provide the intellectual disability care worker with an overview of drugs and society, the role of the careworker, the forms and administration of drugs, the most commonly prescribed drugs, non-prescription or over-the-counter drugs, and suggestions for teaching self administration. Accompanied by a 42p. in-service training manual.
